title: Which is the most interesting specification Samsung Galaxy A42 5G? - Quora

response.answer_text: Display 6.60-inch.Processor 1.7GHz octa-core.Front Camera 20-megapixel.Rear Camera 48-megapixel + 8-megapixel + 5-megapixel + 5-megapixel.Storage 128GB.Battery Capacity 5000mAh.OS Android 10.these are some interesting features of the galaxy a42 5g

Display 6.60-inch.Processor 1.7GHz octa-core.Front Camera 20-megapixel.Rear Camera 48-megapixel + 8-megapixel + 5-megapixel + 5-megapixel.Storage 128GB.Battery Capacity 5000mAh.OS Android 10.Not so much interesting about Samsung A42 but I like 2 things.First one is super AMOLED display and second is under display fingerprint sensor.
